H0.text: The male of which species of white whale develops a long twisted tusk that projects through its upper lip . Beluga Whale

H1.text: The male of which species of white whale develops a long twisted tusk that projects through its upper lip . Orca

H2.text: The male of which species of white whale develops a long twisted tusk that projects through its upper lip . Pilot Whale

H3.text: The male of which species of white whale develops a long twisted tusk that projects through its upper lip . Narval

A4.text: Narwhal, a species of whale with a long helical tusk
